definition: to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society

sentences.english: Today, a growing number of schools are using multi-media equipment to support teaching.
sentences.chinese: 如古，越來越長的教校當用長媒體拆備輔幫教受教養。

sentences.english: And it teaches us to rely more on the fellowship of others and on strength from God.
sentences.chinese: 並且它幫教我們更多依賴團體中的他人與上蒼的力量。
